name: FredBear's Family Dinner
description:
FFD was opened in the early 80s by Henry Emily and William Afton and was the first establishment in the FNAF franchise. It used specially created animatronics Spring Bonnie and Fredbear in the amount of several pieces: a couple of robots performed on stage, the rest were used by workers as costumes.
